input_dir.description: Input directory containing L2A product or this directory as zip

dem.description: Auxiliary input : dem related to input product (with the same resolution and extent as the input image if preprocessing if desactivated)

tcd.description: Auxiliary input : tree cover density related to input product with the same resolution and extent as the input image (optional, only used for Sentinel-2)

relief_shadow_mask.description: Auxiliary input : hillshade related to input product with the same resolution and extent as the input image (optional)

water_mask.description: Auxiliary input : water mask related to input product with the same resolution and extent as the input image (optional)

log_level.description: Log level : INFO, DEBUG, WARNING, ERROR (optional, default  is INFO

chain_version.description: Hysope 2 chain version (optional, default is lis version)
